title: Water Shader
author: Johnny012345678
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Johnny012345678 于 2013-4-7 09:44 编辑 

Just a simple mod...


如何下載和安裝水著色MOD MINECRAFT1.5.1?1.你們中的大多數應的使用Optifine，所以這個下載會要求你有Optifine
2.將壓縮文件，裡面的“MINECRAFT”文件夾的所有文件複製到minecraft.jar
3.刪除META_INF文件夾中Minecraft.jar的
4.複製Water Shader MOD到MINECRAFT bin文件夾的文件夾
Download:
http://adf.ly/IoE3O






Water-Shader-Mod1.jpg
(24.12 KB, 下载次数: 2)




下载附件


2013-4-7 09:38 上传

replies.author: zhangchiyuanbo
replies.txt_content: ？？水反？

翻译How to download and install the water color MOD MINECRAFT1.5.1? 1 most of you should use Optifine, so this download will require you to have Optifine

2 the compressed file, copy all the files inside the "MINECRAFT" folder to minecraft.jar

3 to delete the Minecraft.jar META_INF folder

4 copies of Water Shader MOD to MINECRAFT bin folder
